Title: Parasyte: Part 2
Writer: Hitoshi Iwaaki (manga), Ryôta Kosawa (screenplay), Sean Whitley, Takashi Yamazaki (screenplay)
Actors: Tadanobu Asano, Jun Kunimura, Kazuki Kitamura, Shôta Sometani
Plot: Humanity is under attack by human-mimicking flesh-eating alien parasites. One parasite bonds with his young high school student host, and he convinces the parasite to help him stop the others.
